value.string:
getUid
 getParentUid
 query
 omit_input
 omit_output
 resource_uid:list
 from_date
 at_date
 to_date
 simulation_state:list
 node_uid:list
 stat

<dtml-if getParentUid>
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 SUM(stock.quantity) AS quantity
 <dtml-else>
 catalog.uid
 , catalog.path
 , stock.date as date
 , section.title as section_title
 , IF(delivery.source_section_uid = stock.section_uid,
 catalog.source_reference,
 catalog.destination_reference) AS specific_reference
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity > 0, stock.quantity, 0)), 0) AS debit
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity < 0, - stock.quantity, 0)), 0) AS credit
 , - IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity < 0, - stock.quantity, 0)), 0)
 + IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity > 0, stock.quantity, 0)), 0) AS balance 
 </dtml-if>
 FROM
 movement
 , catalog AS child
 , catalog
 , catalog AS node
 , category AS node_category
 , delivery
 , stock
 LEFT JOIN catalog AS section
 ON stock.mirror_section_uid = section.uid
 <dtml-if query>
 , category
 </dtml-if>
 WHERE stock.section_uid = <dtml-var getParentUid>
 AND stock.payment_uid = <dtml-var getUid>
 AND delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND movement.uid = stock.uid
 AND movement.is_accountable = 1
 AND node.uid = stock.node_uid
 AND node.uid = node_category.uid
 AND node_category.category_uid = <dtml-sqlvar
 "portal_categories.account_type.asset.cash.bank.getUid()" type="int">
 <dtml-if node_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in node_uid>
 stock.node_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 movement.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND stock.date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND stock.date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND stock.date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.quantity > 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.quantity < 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if simulation_state>
 AND (
 <dtml-in simulation_state>
 catalog.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if query>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND <dtml-var query>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-unless stat>
 GROUP BY catalog.uid
 </dtml-unless>
 ORDER BY stock.date, movement.uid
 </dtml-if>

<dtml-if getParentUid>
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 SUM(stock.quantity) AS quantity
 <dtml-else>
 catalog.uid
 , catalog.path
 , stock.date as date
 , section.title as section_title
 , IF(delivery.source_section_uid = stock.section_uid,
 catalog.source_reference,
 catalog.destination_reference) AS specific_reference
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity > 0, stock.quantity, 0)), 0) AS debit
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity < 0, - stock.quantity, 0)), 0) AS credit
 , - IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity < 0, - stock.quantity, 0)), 0)
 + IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity > 0, stock.quantity, 0)), 0) AS balance 
 </dtml-if>
 FROM
 movement
 , catalog AS child
 , catalog
 , catalog AS node
 , category AS node_category
 , delivery
 , stock
 LEFT JOIN catalog AS section
 ON stock.mirror_section_uid = section.uid
 <dtml-if query>
 , category
 </dtml-if>
 WHERE stock.section_uid = <dtml-var getParentUid>
 AND stock.payment_uid = <dtml-var getUid>
 AND delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND movement.uid = stock.uid
 AND movement.is_accountable = 1
 AND node.uid = stock.node_uid
 AND node.uid = node_category.uid
 AND node_category.category_uid = <dtml-sqlvar
 "portal_categories.account_type.asset.cash.bank.getUid()" type="int">
 <dtml-if node_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in node_uid>
 stock.node_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 movement.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND stock.date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND stock.date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND stock.date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.quantity > 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.quantity < 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if simulation_state>
 AND (
 <dtml-in simulation_state>
 catalog.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if query>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND <dtml-var query>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-unless stat>
 GROUP BY catalog.uid
 </dtml-unless>
 ORDER BY stock.date, movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
